Package de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.api

Provides Interfaces for different dao method implementations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnnotationService
    This interface contains methods which are related to TagSet, Tag and Type for the annotation project .
    RepositoryService
    This interface contains methods that are related to accessing/creating/deleting...

Package de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.api Description

Provides Interfaces for different dao method implementations. Currently there are two Interfaces, AnnotationService and RepositoryService . AnnotationService conatins mehtods related to AnnotationType ,TagSet, and Tag . The RepositoryService contains methods related to persistent Objects SourceDocument, AnnotationDocument, User, Project and so on
